pages.text: $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/texture-packs/ice-and-fire-mod-resource-packs/files/2774338)Wild Dragons$()$(br2)This pack simply retextures all of the Ice and Fire dragons, making them a bit fancier. It adds a bit more detail into them and the coloring is a bit more traditional.
